goal.en: The objective of the course is to explore the thinking of fundamental concepts and development of statistical theory and learning the Bayesian methods for solving problems from a different point of view. Modern computational skills will be emphasized to implement the Bayesian methodology.
goal.ch: 課程目標為以釐清統計基礎觀念及其理論為出發點，從不同角度切入貝氏統計的觀點與技巧，並將統計計算方法應用在貝氏分析中。

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. Motivation for Bayesian Analysis
3. Bayesian Inference
4. Empirical and Hierarchical Bayesian Approaches
5. Computation and Applications
6. Model Criticism and Selection
